title-part.text: APPARATUS OR TOOLS SPECIALLY DESIGNED FOR MAKING OR MAINTAINING CLOCKS OR WATCHES

note.note-paragraph: In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.

title-part.text: Gripping, holding, or supporting devices

reference.text: stands in general F16M; for instruments G01D11/30, B01L

CPC-specific-text.text: Workbenches, supports; Workbenches provided with suction devices; for dust; Illumination
Supporting means facilitating assembly and mechanisation, e.g. magazines for components

reference.text: machines for assembly G04D1/0071; supports in general G04D1/06

CPC-specific-text.text: with power source for driving the screwdriver
tools for setting, riveting or pressing, e.g. nippers for this purpose
for non-automatic assembly, with automatic transport between workbenches

reference.text: hand tools with pneumatic means G04D1/02

CPC-specific-text.text: Devices for positioning and sorting of the components

reference.text: sorting and positioning in general B23Q

title-part.text: Tweezers
Vice clamps or other special hand tools for watchmakers

reference.text: G04D1/04, G04D1/08, G04D1/10 take precedence; vices B25B; devices for setting bearing jewels and parts thereof G04D3/04; devices for setting watch glasses G04D3/06
tweezers for medical purposes A61B; setting tools B41B1/00
nippers for setting watch glasses G04D3/067
machines for setting bearing jewels G04D3/0002

CPC-specific-text.text: Hand tools for gripping or holding by magnetic means
Hand tools for gripping or holding by pneumatic means

title-part.text: Tools for setting springs

CPC-specific-text.text: for coil springs in regulating mechanisms

title-part.text: Supporting devices for clockworks or parts of time-pieces

CPC-specific-text.text: provided with a pick-up means, e.g. microphone

reference.text: measuring and control means for comparison with a standard frequency G04D7/12
packaging for small items, packaging for special items B65D

title-part.text: Tools for setting or removing hands
Devices for opening or closing watch bottoms or covers
Watchmakers' or watch-repairers' machines or tools for working materials

reference.text: metal working in general class B23

CPC-specific-text.text: for mechanical working other than with a lathe

reference.text: springs in general B21F; mainspring construction G04B1/14; springs for the regulating mechanism see G04D3/0041
construction of spring barrels G04B1/16, G04B1/18

CPC-specific-text.text: for parts of the winding-up mechanism, e.g. for winding axles, crowns
for components of the pawl construction, stop clicks, clutches
for axletaps, e.g. for grinding or polishing thereof
for components of the escape mechanism
for components of the regulating mechanism

reference.text: coil-springs in general B21F; springs for the driving mechanism G04D3/0007

CPC-specific-text.text: for components of the time-indicating mechanisms

reference.text: machines for boring through stones B28D; for diamonds B24B; diamond polishing B24B9/16; manufacture of drawing stones B23P5/00; setting of industrial stones B23P15/24

CPC-specific-text.text: for components for protecting the mechanism against external influences
for the fastening means of the case or bracelet
for working with non-mechanical means, e.g. chemical, electrochemical, metallising, vapourising; with electron beams, laser beams
for treatment of the material, e.g. surface treatment
for components of driving mechanisms, e.g. mainspring
for components of the escapement mechanism, e.g. lever escapement, escape wheel
for components of the regulating mechanism, e.g. coil springs
for components of the time-indicating mechanism, e.g. dials
for components of the means protecting the mechanism against external influences, e.g. cases

title-part.text: Lathes, with one or more supports
Burnishing machines, with one or more supports

reference.text: metal lathes B23B; automatic lathes B23B; grinding and polishing in general class B24

CPC-specific-text.text: for the manufacture of special components for clockworks
for components of the time-indicating mechanism, e.g. dials
for components of the means protecting the mechanism from external influences, e.g. cases

title-part.text: Devices for placing bearing jewels, bearing sleeves, or the like in position

reference.text: fixing jewels A44C17/04; tools for assembling and taking apart gear wheels and bearing components B25B; machines for the manufacture of bearing jewels and components G04D3/0002
pressing nippers and hand tools G04D1/0042

CPC-specific-text.text: for the coil rolls or bobbins

title-part.text: Devices for shaping or setting watch glasses

reference.text: cutting watch glasses C03B33/04; grinding or working of spectacle lenses and lenses B24B; working plastic materials in general B29

CPC-specific-text.text: Shaping without chipping away, e.g. by hot pressing or by punching out the whole piece from a plate
Shaping by removing material, e.g. cutting out from a plate, milling the edges
Setting or taking apart, whereby a temporary deformation of the glass may take place

title-part.text: Machines or apparatus for cleaning

CPC-specific-text.text: whereby the components to be cleaned are placed in a container
whereby the container rotates in a cleaning fluid

title-part.text: Oiling devices
Special lubricant containers for watchmakers

reference.text: bearings constructed with regard to oiling of the clockwork G04B31/08; oilcans for lubricating in general F16N3/04

CPC-specific-text.text: Oilcans and other hand tools for lubricating special parts of the clockwork mechanism

title-part.text: Measuring, counting, calibrating, testing or regulating apparatus

reference.text: measuring devices and calibers in general G01B; counters in general H03K

CPC-specific-text.text: Purely mechanical measuring and testing apparatus
Counters for small components, e.g. bearing jewels
Testing apparatus for complete clockworks with regard to external influences or general good working
with regard to the sealing of the case
with regard to the reaction to shocks
with regard to the functioning of the automatic winding-up device

title-part.text: for mainsprings
for gearwork,

reference.text: e.g. optical control of gear wheels; optical control in general G01B, G01B9/08

title-part.text: for escapements
for balance wheels

CPC-specific-text.text: for adjusting the felloe or the shafts

reference.text: adjustment of the gear wheels G04D7/04

CPC-specific-text.text: by setting adjustable elements, e.g. balance wheel screws
by removing material from the balance wheel itself
Automatic devices therefor (balancing and loading or removing carried out automatically)
by loading the balance wheel itself with material

title-part.text: for hairsprings
Timing devices for clocks or watches for comparing the rate of the oscillating member with a standard

reference.text: supporting devices for clocks with built-in recording apparatus G04D1/063; measuring short time intervals G04F10/00; frequency measuring in general H04B, G01R

CPC-specific-text.text: Devices for facilitating the reading or the interpretation of the recording
for the control mechanism only (found from outside the clockwork)
wherein further adjustment devices are present
for the control mechanism only (from outside the clockwork)
whereby the adjustment device works on the compass
whereby the adjustment device works on the mainspring
whereby the adjustment device works on the balance wheel

title-part.text: Demagnetising devices
Subject matter not provided for in other groups of this subclass
